name: EGaDS! Mega Micro-Jam 2021
description:
Travel through perilous outer space to return to your family, in 20 unique minigames!

Drawing inspiration from the WarioWare series, participants in the EGaDS! Mega Micro-Jam were tasked with creating a short game (3-6 seconds) for the theme "space". The work of 17 teams and 7 solo jammers was compiled into this big project!

Controls:

WASD + Space
